lexUnit.name: improvised explosive device.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: an unconventional explosive device, usually hidden or transported secretly to a target.

sentence.text: Rowe was killed Tuesday when an improvised explosive device detonated near his vehicle in central Afghanistan 's Panjshir Province , northeast of Kabul .
